subject: AW: Simsonn Order Confirmation #SSN2460
description_text:
Hello Simsonn Team,

 

Thank you for you message and your kind offer. I would like to take the upgrade for the discounted price and the immediate shipment from Germany. Please make sure to include the Base- and Heelplate that were part of the original order and let me know how to send you the extra 30$.

 

Best regards,

Harald Kessler

 

Von: SIMSONN <service@simsonn.com> 
Gesendet: Freitag, 29. August 2025 05:54
An: kentuki@mailbox.org
Betreff: Simsonn Order Confirmation #SSN2460

 






 <https://www.simsonn.com> SIMSONN 


 



Hello, the inventory replenishment we sent to our German warehouse has arrived, but the Pro X Ultra-P2-H2 is still out of stock. We can upgrade you to the 3-pedal version Pro X Ultra-P3-H3 at a discounted price of $30 and ship it immediately via DHL from our German warehouse. Alternatively, we can ship it immediately from China via UPS, or you can continue to wait until next Monday for shipment from Germany. Please let me know your preference.

 



If you have any questions, reply to this email or contact us at  <mailto:service@simsonn.com> service@simsonn.com

  <https://cdn.shopify.com/shopifycloud/shopify/assets/themes_support/notifications/spacer-1a26dfd5c56b21ac888f9f1610ef81191b571603cb207c6c0f564148473cab3c.png>

conversations.body_text: Okay, I'll arrange for your shipment immediately. You can click the link to pay the price difference.  https://www.simsonn.com/products/difference-2
